author: Darrell Etherington
title: New crowdsourced COVID-19 symptom map could build a more complete pandemic picture
description: A new initiative by the Boston Children’s Hospital and Harvard Medical School could provide a new kind of signal for those studying the spread of the coronavirus pandemic across the U.S. The ‘Covid Near You’ map developed by researchers at both organizations,…
